other_tests.procedure_name: CT Abdomen and Pelvis without Contrast
other_tests.findings: There is mural thickening of the sigmoid colon with mild adjacent stranding. There has been a slight interval increase in size of a 4.1 x 3.2 x 6.3 cm collection containing predominantly air and fecal matter, previously measuring 3.7 x 3.3 x 4.3 cm.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Slight increase in size of the collection in the sigmoid colon.

other_tests.findings: Increased drainage noted, with purulent material in the drain bulb. The skin surrounding the drain is non-erythematous with some pus present.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased drainage observed over the past several days.
